mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND editor_id = #{editorId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(follow_id) FROM follow WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND editor_id = #{editorId}
SELECT COUNT(editor_id) FROM follow WHERE editor_id = #{editorId}

SELECT ed.editor_id , ed.user_id , ed.profile_image , u_editor.nickname , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow f_sub WHERE f_sub.editor_id = ed.editor_id) AS count FROM follow f LEFT JOIN user u_user ON u_user.user_id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN editor_detail ed ON f.editor_id = ed.editor_id LEFT JOIN user u_editor ON u_editor.user_id = ed.user_id WHERE u_user.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY ed.editor_id, ed.user_id, ed.profile_image, u_editor.nickname
